channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1494488721697251330
item.description:
#ATENCIÓN #DatosAbiertos 🇵🇪 🔴Casi UN MILLÓN de registros de casos positivos con test antígenos sin fecha: UNA semana con este problema
👎Así NO podemos analizar con exactitud la evolución de la curva de casos por #Covid_19
📢@Minsa_Peru esperemos den pronta solución a esto https://t.co/FCOMfKU7Q9

item.title: #es @ 1494451712572145666
item.description:
Exclusiva 🤣
¿Saben que otra cosa dicen las bases de datos abiertos? Que mientras las ONGs recibieron nueve millones 729 mil dólares en los últimos tres años, el Ejército y la Marina sumaron 165 millones de dólares de financiamiento hacia fuerzas militares extranjeras. https://t.co/NUPqXUadHA

item.title: #en @ 1494386704517636110
item.description:
Do you have a dataset that you can't really fit into an article narrative? Consider publishing it as a Data Article!
The @turingway now has a section on Data Articles! Did we miss a journal? Feel free to contribute and add them! https://t.co/sUn6qZ0GB1 #OpenData #RDM

item.description: @marccold The future of linked open data is that there will be new linked open data projects forever, and then the grant funding will run out for each, and then there are just broken links.

item.title: #en @ 1494355936764256270
item.description: We're very excited on where the metabolomics field is going. We think that open data and open science really has moved the needle. item.title: #en @ 1494351433944031247
item.description:
Correspondence | @Pdorrestein1, @mingxunwang & Nuno Bandeira present a quick-start interface that simplifies the analysis of untargeted metabolomics data through @GNPS_UCSD, and allows for community contributions in the spirit of #OpenData. #tbt
https://t.co/HhPCocxDNJ

item.description: just got another e-mail about how I need to prepare for a future of BIBFRAME and linked open data and I'm like. what future of BIBFRAME and linked data. where. do BIBFRAME and linked data live in that alternate universe where librarians are always retiring all the time

item.title: #en @ 1494334950601936898
item.description: I'm just a PhD student, standing in front of an open data portal, asking you to please upload the data in a readable format that is not a PDF so I don't have to actually write code to make it readable before I can use it

Ces lots sont des lots Packaging et non Bulk (leur taille est donc très variable selon les pays de destination).

item.description: What @toriboeck says. Couldn’t stress this enough. Why do we need #usecases for #opendata to convince public organisations even if we have policies? item.title: #es @ 1493916375504629763
item.description:
#TerceraOla #Omicron Lima Tras un descenso acelerado de casos #COVID19 desde el 26/01 al 08/02, ahora se observa una leve inflexión al alza durante 6 días.

item.title: #nl @ 1493891252579885062
item.description: Vrijwel alle #veestapels dragen bij aan reductie Stikstof- en Fosfaatuitscheiding. Alleen bij #geiten (+200%) #vleeskalveren (+77%) #leghennen (+39%) en #melkkoeien (+15%) ligt de N-uitscheiding hoger tov 2002, wel reductie (-40%) jongvee melkveehouderij https://t.co/34cIkvKFOv https://t.co/z5Pp5pndqq

item.title: #en @ 1493869081140899843
item.description: Wrote down some thoughts on the role of #OpenData use cases in govt contexts. Summary: I worry current discourse stresses use cases too much, to the point that govt employees misunderstand the "why" behind open data & develop false expectations. EN Post: https://t.co/GNO5RkZiqG

item.title: #en @ 1493822720202579971
item.description:
By combining the ease-of-use of a SQL database with the capabilities of the Permaweb, Kwil DB enables a new form of open data composability previously impossible in Web3.
We're excited to see the amazing things the community will be able to build with a Permaweb SQL database!

item.title: #es @ 1493763283060510720
item.description:
#TerceraOla #DatosAbiertos 🇵🇪 La cantidad de muertes por #COVID19 en el Perú siguen en descenso tras haber alcanzado (en esta 3ra ola) el 25% del máximo pico de toda la pandemia. El pico de la 3ra ola se ha reducido en 23% tras 11 días.
#TomeNota Hoy MINSA reportará 47 muertes https://t.co/j3NilZ5GDJ
